verses.text: Lo, mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all \add this\add*, mine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* and \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* it.
What ye \w know|strong="H1847"\w*, \add the same\add* do I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* also: I \add am\add* not \w inferior|strong="H5307"\w* unto you.
\w Surely|strong="H0199"\w* I would \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, and I \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* to \w reason|strong="H3198"\w* with \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.
\w But|strong="H0199"\w* ye \add are\add* \w forgers|strong="H2950"\w* of \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, ye \add are\add* all \w physicians|strong="H7495"\w* of no \w value|strong="H0457"\w*.
O \w that|strong="H5414"\w* ye would \w altogether|strong="H2790"\w* hold your \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*! and it should be your \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now my \w reasoning|strong="H8433"\w*, and \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w* to the \w pleadings|strong="H7379"\w* of my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.
Will ye \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H5766"\w* for \w God|strong="H0410"\w*? and \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="H7423"\w* for him?
Will ye \w accept|strong="H5375"\w* his \w person|strong="H6440"\w*? will ye \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* for \w God|strong="H0410"\w*?

Is it \w good|strong="H2895"\w* that he should search you \w out|strong="H2713"\w*? or as one \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w mocketh|strong="H2048"\w* another, do ye \add so\add* \w mock|strong="H2048"\w* him?
He will \w surely|strong="H3198"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* you, if ye do \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w* \w accept|strong="H5375"\w* \w persons|strong="H6440"\w*.
Shall not his \w excellency|strong="H7613"\w* make you \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*? and his \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon you?

Your \w remembrances|strong="H2146"\w* \add are\add* \w like|strong="H4912"\w* unto \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*, your \w bodies|strong="H1354"\w* to \w bodies|strong="H1354"\w* of \w clay|strong="H2563"\w*.

Hold your \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, let me alone, that I may \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, and let \w come|strong="H5674"\w* on me what \add will\add*.\f + \fr 13.13 \ft Hold…: Heb. Be silent from me\f*
Wherefore do I \w take|strong="H5375"\w* my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in my \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*?

\w Though|strong="H2005"\w* he \w slay|strong="H6991"\w* me, yet will I \w trust|strong="H3176"\w* in him: but I will \w maintain|strong="H3198"\w* mine own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 13.15 \ft maintain: Heb. prove, or, argue\f*
He also \add shall be\add* my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: for an \w hypocrite|strong="H2611"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.
\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* my \w speech|strong="H4405"\w*, and my \w declaration|strong="H0262"\w* with your \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.
Behold now, I have \w ordered|strong="H6186"\w* \add my\add* \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*; I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I shall be \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*.
Who \add is\add* he \add that\add* will \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* with me? for now, if I hold my \w tongue|strong="H2790"\w*, I shall give up the \w ghost|strong="H1478"\w*.
Only \w do|strong="H6213"\w* not \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add things\add* unto me: then will I not \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* myself from \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w Withdraw|strong="H7368"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me: and let not thy \w dread|strong="H0367"\w* make me \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*.
Then \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thou, and I will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*: or let me \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* thou me.
How many \add are\add* mine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* and \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*? make me to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* my \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* and my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.
Wherefore \w hidest|strong="H5641"\w* thou thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w holdest|strong="H2803"\w* me for thine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*?

Wilt thou \w break|strong="H6206"\w* a \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* driven to and \w fro|strong="H5086"\w*? and wilt thou \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* the \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*?

For thou \w writest|strong="H3789"\w* bitter \w things|strong="H4846"\w* against me, and makest me to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

Thou \w puttest|strong="H7760"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* also in the \w stocks|strong="H5465"\w*, and lookest \w narrowly|strong="H8104"\w* unto all my \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*; thou settest a \w print|strong="H2707"\w* upon the \w heels|strong="H8328"\w* of my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 13.27 \ft lookest…: Heb. observest\f*\f + \fr 13.27 \ft heels: Heb. roots\f*
And he, as a rotten \w thing|strong="H7538"\w*, \w consumeth|strong="H1086"\w*, as a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* that is \w moth|strong="H6211"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.
